text: Vaqte [az ƣazvai Taʙuk] ʙa sūjaşon ʙargarded, ʙarojaton uzr meovarand. [Ej pajomʙar] Bigū: «Uzr najovared, mo hargiz [suxani] şumoro ʙovar namekunem. Dar haqiqat, Alloh taolo moro az axʙori şumo ogoh kardaast va ʙa zudī Alloh taolo va pajomʙaraş raftoratonro xohand did [ki ojo tavʙa mekuned jo ʙar nifoq memoned]. On goh ʙa sūji [Alloh taoloi] donoi pinhon va oşkor ʙozgardonda meşaved va Ū şumoro az onci mekarded, ogoh mekunad»
